content.p: We welcome students funded by a variety of sponsors and funding schemes. Here you can find out about some of the sources of funding you could apply for. As well as the information on our website, there are a variety of online scholarship search tools to help you find funding opportunities, including: When looking for scholarships online, always try to find out about the organisations offering them if you're not familiar with them. Avoid websites or scholarship providers with a bad reputation, unreasonable terms or suspicious instructions such as asking you for payments or bank details. We've noted scholarship and funding providers for individual countries in our country-specific information webpages. The scholarships and funding sources listed below are available to students across many countries.
